TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeDescriptorFilterService

summary.span: 提供在设计模式下修改组件的成员描述符集的接口。

span.span: Provides an interface to modify the set of member descriptors for a component in design mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口提供了一个接口，该接口允许在设计时修改组件的属性、事件和类级别属性。The interface provides an interface that allows modification of the properties, events, and class-level attributes of a component at design time. 此修改通过组件通过 提供的一组描述符进行。This modification occurs through the set of descriptors that a component provides through a . 类型描述符将在组件的站点中查询 服务，如果该服务存在，则类型描述符会将它收集到的所有元数据传递给该服务。The type descriptor will query a component's site for the service and, if it exists, the type descriptor will pass all metadata it has collected to this service. 然后，该服务可通过添加、删除和更改组件的现有特性来修改元数据。The service can then modify the metadata by adding, removing, and altering existing characteristics of the component. 例如，可以通过调用 方法修改组件的属性。For example, the properties of a component can be modified through a call to the method. 筛选服务获取一个字典，其中包含类型 的属性名称及其属性说明符。The filter service obtains a dictionary that contains property names and their property descriptors of type . 使用以下逻辑实现修改。The modifications are implemented using the following logic. |修改Modification|实现Implementation| |------------------|--------------------| |删除Removal|删除字典中的相应条目。Delete the corresponding entry in the dictionary.| |加Addition|将相应的项添加到字典中。Add the appropriate entry to the dictionary.| |更改Alteration|调用现有的属性描述符方法，替换关联的属性描述符条目，或者替换字典中的整个属性键/值对。Call existing property descriptor methods, replace the associated property descriptor entry, or replace the entire property key/value pair in the dictionary.| 的返回值确定此属性集是否是固定的。The return value of determines if this set of properties is fixed. 如果此方法返回 `true`，则此组件的 可以缓存结果。If this method returns `true`, the for this component can cache the results. 在对组件进行垃圾回收或调用类型描述符 方法之前，将保留此缓存。This cache is maintained until either the component is garbage collected or the method of the type descriptor is called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个设计器，该设计器使用 筛选任何新的或现有的 的特性集合，以便在加载或重新加载该按钮的设计器之前为新设计器添加设计器特性。The following code example demonstrates a designer that uses the to filter the attributes collection of any new or existing to add a designer attribute for a new designer before loading or reloading the designer for the button. 若要使用此示例，请将代码添加到 Windows 窗体项目，然后将类库中的组件加载到工具箱。To use the example, add the code to a Windows Forms project and load the components from the class library into the Toolbox. 另请参阅[演练：用自定义组件自动填充工具箱](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx)。Also see [Walkthrough: Automatically Populating the Toolbox with Custom Components](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx). 向窗体中添加一些按钮。Add some buttons to your form. 将 `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` 添加到窗体中，它将显示在组件栏中。Add a `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` to your form, and it will appear in the component tray. `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` 将添加一个 `ButtonDesignerFilterService`来实现 ，作为设计模式服务提供程序。The `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` will add a `ButtonDesignerFilterService`, which implements , as a design mode service provider. 窗体上的现有或新 对象将在 `ButtonDesignerFilterService` 用 `ColorCycleButtonDesigner`替换每个现有和新按钮的设计器后开始颜色循环。Existing or new objects on the form will begin color cycling after the `ButtonDesignerFilterService` replaces the designer for each existing and new button with a `ColorCycleButtonDesigner`. 当将鼠标指针移到按钮上时，按钮会变成颜色循环，并在 `MouseLeave` 事件上继续循环或重置背景色和前景色。The buttons will color cycle when you move the mouse pointer over them, and alternately continue cycling or reset the background and foreground colors on `MouseLeave` events. 将通过已加载的 `ButtonDesignerFilterService` 的 方法为新 对象提供 `ColorCycleButtonDesigner`，直到释放 `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` 并替换原始 。New objects will be given the `ColorCycleButtonDesigner` through the method of the `ButtonDesignerFilterService` that has been loaded, until the `ButtonDesignerFilterComponent` is disposed and replaces the original . 本示例中的 `ColorCycleButton` 类是与 `ColorCycleButtonDesigner`关联的 。The `ColorCycleButton` class in this example is a associated with a `ColorCycleButtonDesigner`. [!code-cpp[ITypeDescriptorFilterService#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ITypeDescriptorFilterService/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ITypeDescriptorFilterService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ITypeDescriptorFilterService/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ITypeDescriptorFilterService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ITypeDescriptorFilterService/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 若要筛选由 公开的成员说明符，请在组件上实现此接口，并重写此类的 、或 方法，分别用于筛选特性、事件或属性。

span.span: To filter the member descriptors exposed by a , implement this interface on a component and override the , , or methods of this class to filter attributes, events, or properties, respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool FilterAttributes (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.Collections.IDictionary attributes);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool FilterAttributes(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.Collections.IDictionary attributes) cil managed
Public Function FilterAttributes (component As IComponent, attributes As IDictionary) As Boolean
abstract member FilterAttributes : System.ComponentModel.IComponent * System.Collections.IDictionary -> bool

span.span: The component to filter the attributes of.
A dictionary of attributes that can be modified.

summary.span: 筛选组件通过 公开的属性。

span.span: Filters the attributes that a component exposes through a .

returns.span: 如果将缓存经过筛选的特性集，则为 ；如果筛选服务必须再次查询，则为 。

span.span: if the set of filtered attributes is to be cached; if the filter service must query again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户请求组件的一组属性时，将调用此方法。This method is called when a user requests a set of attributes for a component. 这些特性将添加到字典中，其中的属性的 作为键，实际属性作为值。The attributes are added to the dictionary with the attribute's as the keys and the actual attribute as the value. 此服务的实施者可以在字典中添加、删除或更改现有属性项。Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter existing attribute entries in the dictionary.

para.span: 仅在必要时返回 ，因为对类型描述符筛选器服务的重复查询会降低性能。

span.span: Return only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool FilterEvents (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.Collections.IDictionary events);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool FilterEvents(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.Collections.IDictionary events) cil managed
Public Function FilterEvents (component As IComponent, events As IDictionary) As Boolean
abstract member FilterEvents : System.ComponentModel.IComponent * System.Collections.IDictionary -> bool

param.name: component
param.span: 要为其筛选事件的组件。

span.span: The component to filter events for.
A dictionary of events that can be modified.

summary.span: 筛选组件通过 公开的事件。

span.span: Filters the events that a component exposes through a .

returns.span: 如果将缓存经过筛选的事件集，则为 ；如果筛选服务必须再次查询，则为 。

span.span: if the set of filtered events is to be cached; if the filter service must query again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户请求组件的一组事件时，将调用此方法。This method is called when a user requests a set of events for a component. 事件会添加到字典中，其中事件名称为键，相应的 对象作为值。The events are added to the dictionary with the event names as the keys and the corresponding objects as the values. 此服务的实现者可以在字典中添加、移除或更改事件项。Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter event entries in the dictionary.

para.span: 仅在必要时返回 ，因为对类型描述符筛选器服务的重复查询会降低性能。

span.span: Return only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户请求组件的一组属性时，将调用此方法。This method is called when a user requests a set of properties for a component. 属性将添加到字典中，其中的属性名称作为键，并将相应的 对象作为值。The properties are added to the dictionary with the property names as the keys and the corresponding objects as the values. 此服务的实现者可以在字典中添加、删除或更改属性项。Implementers of this service can add, remove, or alter property entries in the dictionary.

para.span: 仅在必要时返回 ，因为对类型描述符筛选器服务的重复查询会降低性能。

span.span: Return only when necessary, because repeated queries to the type descriptor filter service can decrease performance.
